MAX_ARRAY_SIZE - Static variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.CharacterGame
Maximum size of the array storing references to characters
maxHealth - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
Max health for the character as an integer value.
MutantEagle - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model
This class represents a Mutant Eagle as combat character It is a subclass of the character class
MutantEagle() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.MutantEagle
This is the no-arg constructor of the Mutant Eagle class It is chained to MutantEagle (int maxHealth, int currentHealth, int strength)
MutantEagle(int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.MutantEagle
This is the parameterized constructor of the MutantEagle class it invokes the parameterized constructor of the superclass The constructor sets the values to those of the Mutant Eagle
mutantEagleHealth - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.MutantEagle
The instance variables represent the battle stats of the Mutant Eagle They are calculated via dice rolls from the BonusDiceBag class based on the character set guide mutantEagleHealth represents the current health of the Mutant Eagle mutantEagleMaxHealth represents the maximum health of the Mutant Eagle on creation mutantEagleStrength represents the combat strength attackChance represents a random number which is compared against to calculate the chances of a given attack being generated
mutantEagleMaxHealth - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.MutantEagle
 
mutantEagleStrength - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.MutantEagle
